docs.title: Kano Agent Backlog Skill API
docs.text: Complete Python API reference for the Kano Agent Backlog Skill.

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
from kano_backlog_core import BacklogManager
from kano_backlog_ops import WorkItem

# Initialize backlog operations
manager = BacklogManager()

# Create work items
item = WorkItem.create(title="New feature", type="task")

docs.title: Core Modules
docs.text:
• Core - Core backlog management (kano_backlog_core)
  • CLI - Command-line interface (kano_backlog_cli)
  • Operations - Business operations (kano_backlog_ops)

docs.title: Navigation
docs.text: Use the navigation menu to explore the complete API reference.

docs.title: Main Commands
docs.text:
• kano-backlog item - Work item operations
  • kano-backlog workset - Workset cache operations
  • kano-backlog topic - Topic context operations
  • kano-backlog view - Dashboard and reporting

docs.title: Usage Examples
docs.text:
# Create a new task
kano-backlog item create --type task --title "Add authentication"

# Initialize workset
kano-backlog workset init --item TASK-001

# Create topic
kano-backlog topic create auth-refactor

docs.title: Key Classes
docs.text:
• BacklogManager - Main interface for backlog operations
  • WorkItem - Base class for all work items
  • Config - Configuration management

docs.title: Key Functions
docs.text:
• initialize() - Initialize backlog system
  • validate() - Validate operations
  • persist() - Save changes

docs.title: Core Services
docs.text:
• WorkitemService - Work item management
  • WorksetService - Workset operations
  • TopicService - Topic management
  • ViewService - Dashboard generation

docs.title: Key Operations
docs.text:
• Item lifecycle management
  • Workset cache operations
  • Topic context switching
  • View generation and reporting
